# Visualization

The cross-tab view in the data step allows the researchers to create any visual by drag-n-dropping factors into one of six zones.

* row zone
* column zone
* x-axis zone
* y-axis zone
* color zone
* label zone

The type of visualization is determine by what is configured (or pre-configured)
